content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the price. I'm looking for the highest possible rent. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a responsible individual, I strive for affordable living expenses. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
